sentences.english: Gold recovery from arsenic-containing gold ore has been a major subject of flotation research.
sentences.chinese: 从含砷金矿石中回收金一直是浮选研究的重要课题。

sentences.english: The induced-flotation behavior of chalcopyrite and pyrite was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了黄铜矿和黄铁矿的诱导浮选行为。

sentences.english: Therefore, the paper studies the flotation characteristic of Low-grade barite.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本文进行了低品位重晶石的浮选特性研究。

sentences.english: The CSRC would "adjust the size and pace" of flotations while the pilot was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 证监会将在试点期间，调整浮选的规模和节奏。

sentences.english: The key technology of coal slurry floatation automatic control was addressed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析了煤泥浮选自动控制的特点和关键技术。

sentences.english: Thus, the application of flotation machine was still a considerable way of removing oil.
sentences.chinese: 所以，浮选机的应用还是一种值得考虑的除油方法。

sentences.english: The effective flotation of wolframite-slime would still be a difficult problem in need of solution.
sentences.chinese: 黑钨矿细泥的有效浮选仍是有待解决的选矿难题。

sentences.english: As a chemical intermediate in the production of plasticisers, flotation agents etc.
sentences.chinese: 作为制造增塑剂，浮选剂等之中间体。

sentences.english: The Na 2S-induced flotation behavior of chalcopyrite and pyrite has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了黄铜矿，黄铁矿的硫化钠诱导浮选行为。

sentences.english: Thionocarbamates are excellent flotation collectors for sulfide ore.
sentences.chinese: 硫氨酯是硫化矿石的优良浮选捕收剂。

sentences.english: Flotation is used for Florida and Kola rock.
sentences.chinese: 浮选操作法用于佛罗里达磷矿和科拉磷矿。

sentences.english: Property and slurry character of floatation tailings in Linhuan were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了临涣选煤厂浮选尾煤的性质及成浆性。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a floating and collecting agent of bertrandite beryllium ores and application thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种羟硅铍石类铍矿浮选捕收剂及其应用。

sentences.english: Elimination of the interference of slimes is the key in the flotation of finlegnained hematite ores.
sentences.chinese: 排除矿泥的干扰，是浮选细粒红铁矿石成功的关键。

sentences.english: The bubble generator is the key equipment of microbubble floatation.
sentences.chinese: 气泡发生器是微泡浮选的关键。

sentences.english: Therefore, application of the floatation froth image processing was studied.
sentences.chinese: 为此，进行了浮选泡沫图像处理应用的研究。

definition: mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
see 球磨機|球磨机[qiu2 mo2 ji1]
veinstone (stone containing a vein of precious metal)
filtrate/solid residue produced by a filter/mud from filtering can sugar
waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
